verses.verse: (Simple Trust in the LORD) A Song of Ascents. Of David. [1] LORD, my heart is not haughty, Nor my eyes lofty. ((Ps. 103:3, 4); Luke 1:68; Titus 2:14) Neither do I concern myself with great matters, Nor with things too profound for me.
Surely I have calmed and quieted my soul, (Jer. 45:5; (Rom. 12:16)) Like a weaned child with his mother; Like a weaned child is my soul within me.
((Matt. 18:3; 1 Cor. 14:20)) O Israel, hope in the LORD From this time forth and forever.
